title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When viewing the Show Report Parameters dialog, the default values for the parameters are not being displayed.
OB: When previewing the report and clicking the Show Report Parameters button, I observed that the default values for the parameters were not shown in the value box. This prevented me from easily modifying the parameter I wanted to change.
EB: I expect that when I click the Show Report Parameters button, the default values for the parameters will be displayed in the value box. This will allow me to easily modify the parameter I want to change.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Preview the report.
2. Click the Show Report Parameters button.

Expected results:
- Default values for the parameters should be displayed in the value box.

Actual results:
- All values in the Enter Parameters dialog are empty, requiring the input of all values even for parameters that should have default values.
